trans:
"My love [redacted_name]ğŸŒ¹,
I told myself it was time to write a long message, because you know, I have things to tell, especially when it comes to your whims ğŸ˜… (but I'm kidding !). You and your whims, are like sugar in tea - a little too much and it's complicated, but it's exactly what makes it delicious ğŸ¬.
I understand that you want to see me everyday, and that's too cute ğŸ˜. But hey, I too have moments when I'm a little... how shall I say... not perfect (but almost ğŸ˜œ). I know that sometimes, I drive you crazy with my own whims ğŸ¤·ğŸ½â™‚ï¸ (you can agree I have a talent for that too ğŸ˜„).
